news.title: 格莱美炸锅！巨星集体呛声
美国对西非三国军政府政策大转弯
news.title0: Three West African juntas have turned to Russia. Now the US wants to engage them
news.content: 美国宣布对马里、布基纳法索和尼日尔三个军政府国家进行重大政策调整，将重点转向安全合作，淡化民主与人权关切。
news.content0: The US has declared a stark policy shift towards three West African countries which are battling Islamist insurgents and whose military governments have broken defence ties with France and turned towards Russia.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普宣布肯尼迪中心将关闭两年翻修
news.title0: Kennedy Center to close for two years for renovations, Trump says
news.content: 美国总统特朗普宣布，华盛顿特区的肯尼迪表演艺术中心将于今年7月起关闭两年，进行大规模翻新和重建。
news.content0: The Kennedy Center in Washington DC will be closed for a two-year renovation beginning in July, US President Donald Trump has announced.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 印度蛇咬危机每年致数万人死亡
news.title0: India's snakebite crisis is killing tens of thousands every year
news.content: 印度每年约有5万人死于蛇咬伤，占全球一半。医疗资源匮乏、抗蛇毒血清短缺及治疗延误是主要问题。
news.content0: Devendra, who was a farmer in India, still remembers the moment a snake sank its fangs into his leg while he was picking mulberry leaves.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计方案，耗资23亿澳元，灵感源自当地特色住宅“昆士兰人”。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 意大利网红村庄限制游客进入著名教堂
news.title0: Italian village restricts access to its Instagram-famous church
news.content: 意大利北部多洛米蒂山脉的圣马达莱纳村，因一座教堂在社交媒体走红。当地将从5月起限制一日游游客进入。
news.content0: For more than a decade, images of Santa Maddalena, a small village church in northern Italy framed by jagged peaks of the Dolomite Mountains, have circulated online. But locals say it was last summer that the steady stream of visitors became a flood.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 阿尔卡拉斯击败德约科维奇首夺澳网冠军
news.title0: Carlos Alcaraz makes history with Australian Open title after defeating Novak Djokovic in enthralling men’s final
news.content: 西班牙网球名将卡洛斯·阿尔卡拉斯逆转击败诺瓦克·德约科维奇，首夺澳网男单冠军，成为最年轻的男子职业全满贯得主。
news.content0: Carlos Alcarazbecame the youngest man ever to complete a career grand slam on Sunday, adding the Australian Open title to his trophy cabinet after defeatingNovak Djokovicin an enthralling men’s final.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 巴基斯坦西南部遭袭致逾120人死亡
news.title0: More than 120 people dead after multiple attacks in southwest Pakistan
news.content: 巴基斯坦俾路支省发生多起自杀式爆炸和枪击袭击，造成包括平民在内的33人死亡，安全部队击毙92名袭击者。
news.content0: Pakistan’s military said Saturday that multiple suicide and gun attacks by “terrorists” across the restive southwestern province ofBalochistankilled 33 people, including civilians, while security forces responding to the violence killed 92 assailants.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 加沙拉法口岸在停火后重新开放
news.title0: Gaza Crossing to Egypt Reopens in Step Forward for Fragile Cease-Fire
news.content: 连接加沙地带与埃及的拉法边境口岸在关闭近一年后重新开放，允许居民离境就医或返回家园。
news.content0: Israel and Egypt had disagreed for months about how to resume operations at the Rafah border crossing, which has been largely closed since May 2024.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 哥斯达黎加右翼候选人因犯罪问题当选总统
news.title0: Costa Rica Elects Right-Wing Candidate Amid Fears Over Crime
news.content: 劳拉·费尔南德斯在哥斯达黎加大选中获胜，其胜利主要源于民众对国内创纪录的暴力犯罪问题的担忧。
news.content0: Laura Fernández’s victory was driven by a crisis in which Costa Rica’s reputation for peace has been tarred by record-breaking violence.
news.author: NYTimes
